ValidationRule.description: When a 20Group opp is moved to Closed/Won, the Group Id must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', RecordType.Name = '20 Groups', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISBLANK( Group_Id__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Group ID before moving this opportunity to Closed Won.
